name: Sonic_Debuff
display_help: You have the ability to control sound in several fashions. You can create semi-solid barriers, set up waves which weaken or strengthen a target, as well as creating soothing sounds which act to counteract any negative effects which may exist on your friends.
power_short_helps: Ranged, Ally +Res(Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative Energy)
Toggle: PBAoE, Ally +Res(All DMG except Psionic, Hold, Immobilize, Disorient)
Toggle: Ranged (Target Ally AoE), Foe Knockback
Ally +Res(Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Terrorize, Confusion), +Perception
Ranged (Location AoE), Minor DMG(Smashing/Energy), Foe Hold, Knockdown, -To Hit, -DEF
